N-3: ae+N-1 t-1 i-0 lt-0 e-1 c-0
ae+N-2 t-1 i-0 lt-0 e-1 c-0

N-1: N-3+ae t-1 i-0 lt-0 e-1 c-0

N-2: N-3+ae t-1 i-0 lt-0 e-1 c-0
ae+N-1 t-2 i-1 lt-1 e-1 c-0
ae+N-3 t-2 i-1 lt-1 e-1 c-0

N-3: N-2+ae t-2 i-1 lt-1 e-1 c-0

N-1: N-2+ae t-2 i-1 lt-1 e-1 c-0

N-2: ae+N-1 t-2 i-2 lt-2 e-0 c-2

N-1: N-2+ae t-2 i-2 lt-2 e-0 c-2

N-2: ae+N-3 t-2 i-2 lt-2 e-0 c-2

N-3: N-2+ae t-2 i-2 lt-2 e-0 c-2

N-1: FLWR is Follower CNDI is Candidate LEAD is Leader
Describes a traceable event at this node
Describes any change in state since previous trace
Simulated node starting with empty log
Simulated client requested that a node (usually leader
but not for all tests) run a command
The previous requested command is finished
Simulating node has simulated a crash
Previously crashed node has restarted. Look at delta column to see effects on log
The node has changed Raft role since last trace line
The node has been partitioned away from the majority network
The node has rejoined the majority network
Node has sent append_entries message to N-X
next line in this table explains
e-2 means that the entries list in the message is 2 items long. eXo-0 is a heartbeat
Node has received the response to an append_entries message
ok-(True or False) means that entries were saved or not
mi-3 says log max index is 3
Node has sent request_vote to N-X
t-1 means current term is 1 (continued next line)
Node has received request_vote response from N-X
yes-(True or False) indicates vote value
Node has sent pre_vote_request to N-X
t-1 means proposed term is 1 (continued next line)
Node has received pre_vote_response from N-X
yes-(True or False) indicates vote value
Node has sent memebership change to N-X op is add or remove and n is the node affected
Node has received membership change response from N-X
Node has sent power transfer command N-X so node should assume power
Node has received power transfer response from N-X
Node has sent snopshot copy command N-X so X node should apply it to local snapshot
Node has received snapshot response from N-X
indicating a log record has been stored
indicating a log record has been stored
Indicates commitIndex has changed to X
meaning log record has been committed
N-2: and possibly applied depending on type of record

N-1: Indicates a change in networks status
N-2: X-2 means partitioned to minority network
